title: Kevin Martin - Lead Singer of Candlebox
itunes:title: Kevin Martin - Lead Singer of Candlebox
description:
We typically think about the life of a rockstar as the perfect gig - but a lot more goes into that lifestyle than just making music, and those who make it to the top know a thing or two about building a brand from the ground up.
 
Kevin Martin grew up knowing that he wanted to play music for the rest of his life, and he became one of the founding members of the band Candlebox in 1990. The road from there wasn’t easy, but through plain hard work and plenty of struggle, Candlebox went on to produce world-changing music, including one record that sold over 400 million copies. Kevin and the band are still active, and his momentum has continued as Candlebox prepares for another tour in the spring of 2020.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and Kevin lay down wisdom on the similarities between running a band and running a business, the responsibility we all have to recognize dishonesty and pursue truth, and doing the legwork necessary to succeed in the long term.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/kevin-martin/
